attributes.action: grant more time for the people of hampshire to respond to the first public consultation on the Hampshire minerals plan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The period between announcing the 'preferred' sites and the consultation date closure is simply not long enough for communities to realise and respond. I request that another 6 weeks be granted so that information can be properly distributed around the affected communities so that the proposals are fully understood.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "grant more time for the people of hampshire to respond to the first public consultation on the Hampshire minerals plan."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14543.asp
